actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that taxable unemployment compensation will be treated as wages for purposes of the limitation on the deduction for individual retirement savings.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat taxable unemployment compensation as wages for purposes of the limitation imposed on the income tax deduction for individual retirement account contributions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that taxable unemployment compensation will be treated as wages for purposes of the limitation on the deduction for individual retirement savings.
